sources.title: Blood Country | Full Western Drama Movie | True Story
sources.description:
Based on a true event of murder, injustice and disorder in Mississippi following the Civil War; and the short story "The Outlaw, the Sheriff, and the Governor" by Robert E. Jones. When Joe Loftin is accused of killing his brother and escapes the law, the honorable Sheriff Dan Lee must bring him to justice.
2017.  Stars: Jeremy London, Travis Mills, William E. Harris

metadata.Plot: Based on true events, Blood Country tells a story of injustice and violence in post-Civil War Mississippi. When Joe Loftin is accused of killing his brother and escapes the law, the honorable Sheriff Dan Lee must bring him to justice.
metadata.Actors: Creek Wilson, Jeremy London, Britton Webb
